import { useHistory, Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const Navbar = ({searchText, setSearchText, inputText, setInputText}) =>{ const history = useHistory() const updateInputText = (e)=> { setInputText(e.target.value) }; const searcSubmit = clicked => { clicked.preventDefault(); history.push("/search"); setSearchText(inputText); setInputText("") } const isActive = { fontWeight: "bold", backgroundColor: "rgba(177, 174, 174, 0.459)", borderRadius: "2em", transition: "500", } return(

) } export default Navbar
